name: Jasper
description: AI copywriting assistant for marketing teams.
howToUse: Sign up, choose a content type, input your topic, and let Jasper generate copy.
cons: May require manual editing for accuracy

name: Copy.ai
description: Write marketing copy, blogs, and more using AI.
howToUse: Choose a template, describe what you need, and Copy.ai writes it for you.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: AI code completion inside your IDE.
howToUse: Install the Copilot extension in VSCode and start typing — suggestions appear automatically.

name: Replit Ghostwriter
description: AI pair programmer inside Replit.
howToUse: Open a project in Replit and let Ghostwriter autocomplete and explain code as you go.

name: Quizlet AI
description: Study smarter with AI-generated flashcards.
howToUse: Upload your notes and let Quizlet generate flashcards and quizzes.

name: Socratic by Google
description: AI homework helper and explainer.
howToUse: Take a photo of your question and get answers or explanations instantly.
cons: Not detailed enough for complex topics

name: Canva Magic Design
description: Design anything with AI help.
howToUse: Go to Canva, choose Magic Design, input your idea or content, and let AI generate design suggestions. Customize as needed.
cons: Some AI outputs may need manual tweaks

name: Runway ML
description: AI-powered creative tools for video & design.
howToUse: Sign in to Runway ML, select an AI tool (like text-to-video), upload your content or prompt, and generate outputs.
pros: Great for video and visual effects
cons: Can be expensive for high-res exports

name: Tidio
description: AI chatbot & live chat for customer support.
howToUse: Integrate Tidio on your website, customize chatbot scripts, and let AI handle live customer interactions.

name: Pictory
description: Turn text into videos using AI.
howToUse: Upload a script or blog post, choose a video template, let Pictory auto-generate a video, then fine-tune the result.

name: Synthesia
description: Create AI-generated videos with avatars.
howToUse: Select an avatar, input your script, choose language and voice, and generate a video with an AI presenter.
cons: No custom avatars on free tier

name: Character.AI
description: Chat with AI characters and bots.
howToUse: Visit the website, choose or create an AI character, and start chatting with it instantly.

name: ChatGPT
description: Converse with OpenAI's advanced chatbot.
howToUse: Go to chat.openai.com
Log in or sign up
Ask a question or give a prompt (e.g. 'Explain relativity like I'm 12')

name: Midjourney
description: Create stunning images from text prompts.
cons: Takes time to learn prompt crafting
howToUse: Join the Midjourney Discord from midjourney.com
Use /imagine followed by a prompt (e.g. '/imagine a cyberpunk cityscape at night')
Upscale or edit your favorite result

name: DALL·E
description: OpenAI’s image generator from text.
cons: Can be slow under high traffic
howToUse: Visit openai.com/dall-e
Enter a text prompt (e.g. 'A cat wearing a space suit on the moon')
Download or use inpainting to edit areas

name: Notion AI
description: Productivity meets AI: write, plan, and organize.
pros: Great for summarizing and rewriting notes
howToUse: Go to a Notion page and type / to access AI commands
Choose actions like summarize, translate, or brainstorm
Refine or edit the results manually

name: Mem
description: AI note-taking tool that helps you remember everything.
pros: Smart AI suggestions while taking notes
howToUse: Sign up at mem.ai
Start typing your notes
Use AI features for summaries, tags, and scheduling

name: EssayDone AI
description: AI-powered essay writing and academic assistance tool.
howToUse: Enter your essay topic, and AI generates drafts or full essays.

name: Intellectia.AI
description: AI research assistant for data analysis and insights.
howToUse: Upload datasets or research questions for AI-generated summaries.

name: Otter.ai
description: AI-powered lecture/meeting transcription tool.
howToUse: Record lectures or meetings for real-time transcripts.

name: Notta AI Notetaker
description: AI meeting transcription and notes.
howToUse: Record calls or upload audio for summaries.

name: My AskAI
description: Custom AI chatbot for knowledge bases.
howToUse: Upload FAQs/docs to train a chatbot for your website.

name: blaze.ai
description: AI sales funnel and lead generation tool.
howToUse: Integrate with CRM to automate lead scoring and outreach.

name: Notta AI Notetaker
description: AI voice notes and transcription for personal use.
howToUse: Record voice memos or interviews for text conversion.
